title: Quick Take: Weekend News and 'The Establishment'
description: A two-topic episode to start your week. First, a review of the weekend's political news, including the latest primary contests and Sunday's Democratic debate, then a look at the biggest buzzword of the 2016 race so far — establishment. This episode, editor/correspondent Ron Elving, digital political reporter Danielle Kurtzleben, and campaign reporter/host Sam Sanders. Find the team on Twitter or email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
